title: JollyGood
author: JollyGood
created_time: February 24, 2023, 10:02:07 PMLast edit: March 01, 2025, 03:14:32 PM by JollyGood
content: self-moderated to keep this thread clean from trolls, attention-seekers and signature spammers.- check for results and fixtures- to chat about their teams- to chat about the players- as well as general chat about the Europa League===================================================LOCAL RULEALL MEMBERS PLEASE NOTE:I want to try to keep this thread clean and legible.If you make posts that are quoting more than 2 members in a single direct reply, it will probably be deleted therefore if your main priority is to post to earn signature campaign fees it will affect your quota if your post gets deleted.Feel free to individually quote and individually reply to each quote to as many members as you want within your post, as that is acceptable.Please keep this local rule in mind when posting here. Thank you.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Here are the games taking place in the Round of 16 on Thursday 9th March 2023:1. FC Union Berlin vs Union Saint-GilloiseBayer Leverkusen vs FerencvarosRoma vs Real SociedadSporting Lisbon vs ArsenalJuventus vs SC FreiburgManchester United vs Real BetisSevilla vs FenerbahceShakhtar Donetsk vs Feyenoord

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: RESULTS:1. FC Union Berlin 3-3 Union Saint-GilloiseBayer Leverkusen 2-0 FerencvarosRoma 2-0 Real SociedadSporting Lisbon 2-2 ArsenalJuventus 1-0 SC FreiburgManchester United 4-1 Real BetisSevilla 2-0 FenerbahceShakhtar Donetsk 1-1 FeyenoordArsenal still have a lot of work to do if they are to progress to the next stage but Manchester United bounced back from their defeat to Liverpool by winning comfortably and should qualify for the next round.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: The first leg of the Europa League quarter-finals take place on Thursday 13th April:Feyenoord vs RomaBayer Leverkusen vs Union Saint-GilloiseJuventus vs Sporting LisbonManchester United vs Sevilla I would expect Feyenoord, Bayer Leverkusen, Juventus and Manchester United to qualify for the semi-finals.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: RESULTS:Feyenoord 1-0 RomaBayer Leverkusen 1-1 Union Saint-GilloiseJuventus 1-0 Sporting LisbonManchester United 2-2 Sevilla Which teams will qualify for the semi-finals? It is too difficult to tell because even Roma and Sporting Lisbon can win their home games by more than a goal and qualify. Sevilla have two away goals and that will help them when they play Manchester United in Spain.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: RESULTS:Roma 4-1 Feyenoord ET (Agg 4 - 2)Sevilla 3-0 Manchester United FT (Agg 5 - 2)Sporting Lisbon 1-1 Juventus FT (Agg 1 - 2)Union Saint-Gilloise 1-4 Bayer Leverkusen (Agg 2 - 5)Manchester United are out, they were thrashed 5-2 on aggregate by Sevilla. They are joined by Union Saint-Gilloise, Feyenoord and Sporting Lisbon as they exit the competition.The semi-finals will take between: Roma, Sevilla, Juventus and Bayer Leverkusen. Congratulations to them  Here are the semi-finals taking place on Thursday 11th May 2023:Juventus vs SevillaRoma vs Bayer Leverkusen

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Europa League FinalSevilla vs RomaThe Europa League final is being played this evening. They are currently at half-time and Roma are winning by scoring the solitary goal by Dybala. It looks as though Roma manager Jose Mourinho is going to get yet another European trophy to add to his portfolio.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Sevilla 1-1 RomaSevilla won the game 4-1 on penaltiesAfter the game Mourinho was verbally abusing the referee in the car park, it was the first European final Mourinho had lost as a manager and it was a tough game. Roma had enough chances to win and probably should have but Sevilla had many chances in the second half to put the game away yet failed.As always with penalties there can never be certainty the best or better team win, in this case the jury is out about who deserved to win over 90 minutes or extra-time but Sevilla are Europa League champions again and congratulations to them.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: A belated result:Fiorentina 1-2 West HamWest Ham United won their first major trophy after a 43 year wait and they won it in the 90th minute with their second goal of the game. Congratulations to them.Throughout his tenure their manager David Moyes showed some of the class that made Manchester United select him as a successor to Ferguson. That job ultimately was too big for him but at West Ham United he found relative success and moderate consistency. This season was tough for them in the Premier League but they went all-out to win the Europa Conference League and Moyes played a huge part in that success by managing the team.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Here we are in the 2023/24 seasonThese are the Europa League games taking place today:AEK Athens vs AjaxAris Limassol vs RangersBacka Topola vs Olympiakos FCMarseille vs Brighton and Hove AlbionRaków Czestochowa vs Sturm GrazReal Betis vs Sparta PragueSC Freiburg vs West Ham UnitedSporting Lisbon vs AtalantaHacken vs Qarabag FKLiverpool vs Union Saint-GilloiseMaccabi Haifa vs PanathinaikosMolde vs Bayer LeverkusenRoma vs ServetteSlavia Prague vs Sheriff Tiraspol (Mol)Toulouse vs Linz ASKVillarreal vs Rennes

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: I am updating the thread for the latest results in the 2024/25 season:These results are from the games played yesterday Thursday 3rd OctoberFerencvaros 1-2 Tottenham Hotspur Hoffenheim 2-0 Dynamo Kiev Lazio 4-1 Nice  Maccabi Tel Aviv 0-2 FC Midtjylland  Olympiakos FC 3-0 Braga  Qarabag FK 1-2 Malmo FF  Real Sociedad 1-2 Anderlecht  Rigas Futbola Skola 2-2 Galatasaray  Slavia Prague 1-1 Ajax  Athletic Bilbao 2-0 AZ Alkmaar Besiktas 1-3 Eintracht Frankfurt  FC Porto 3-3 Manchester United  FC Twente 1-1 Fenerbahce  FC Viktoria Plzen 0-0 Ludogorets  IF Elfsborg 1-0 Roma  PAOK Salonika 0-1 FC Steaua Bucuresti  Rangers 1-4 Lyon  Union Saint-Gilloise 0-0 Bodo/Glimt Well done to Tottenham for winning their games but Manchester United lost a 0-2 lead to find themselves 3-2 down until a late equaliser from substitute Maguire save the day. Manchester United look like a team that has zero plans and zero formation therefore they will be in trouble all season long. As for Porto goalscorer Samu Omorodion, he was the player that could have been sold to Chelsea when Gallagher was sold to Atletico Madrid as part of the wider deal but he ended up at Porto and has shown what he is capable of.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are the latest results:Thursday 7th NovemberBodo/Glimt 1-2 Qarabag FK  Eintracht Frankfurt 1-0 Slavia Prague  FC Steaua Bucuresti 2-0 FC Midtjylland  Galatasaray 3-2 Tottenham Hotspur  IF Elfsborg 1-1 Braga  Ludogorets 1-2 Athletic Bilbao  Nice 2-2 FC Twente  Olympiakos FC 1-1 Rangers  Union Saint-Gilloise 1-1 Roma  AZ Alkmaar 3-1 Fenerbahce Ajax 5-0 Maccabi Tel Aviv  FC Viktoria Plzen 2-1 Real Sociedad Lazio 2-1 FC Porto  Manchester United 2-0 PAOK Salonika  Rigas Futbola Skola 1-1 Anderlecht TSG Hoffenheim 2-2 Lyon Amad was man of the match as Manchester United beat a difficult PAOK Salonika team but Tottenham were beaten away at Galatasaray with two goals scored by Osimhen. The next games in the Europa League take place on 28th November 2024.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are the games taking place today Thursday 28th November:AZ Alkmaar vs GalatasarayAnderlecht vs FC PortoAthletic Bilbao vs IF ElfsborgBesiktas vs Maccabi Tel AvivDynamo Kiev vs FC Viktoria PlzenLazio vs LudogoretsQarabag FK vs LyonRigas Futbola Skola vs PAOK SalonikaBraga vs TSG HoffenheimFC Midtjylland vs Eintracht FrankfurtFC Twente vs Union Saint-GilloiseFCSB vs Olympiakos FCFerencvaros vs Malmo FFManchester United vs Bodo/GlimtNice vs RangersReal Sociedad vs AjaxSlavia Prague vs FenerbahceTottenham Hotspur vs Roma Both of the English teams are playing at home in the 8pm kick-off games against much weaker opponents. Manchester United and Tottenham should win their respective games with relative ease.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These were the results:AZ Alkmaar 1-1 GalatasarayAnderlecht 2-2 FC PortoAthletic Bilbao 3-0 IF ElfsborgBesiktas 1-3 Maccabi Tel AvivDynamo Kiev 1-2 FC Viktoria PlzenLazio 0-0 LudogoretsQarabag FK 1-4 LyonRigas Futbola Skola 0-2 PAOK SalonikaBraga 3-0 TSG HoffenheimFC Midtjylland 1-2 Eintracht FrankfurtFC Twente 0-1 Union Saint-GilloiseFCSB 0-0 Olympiakos FCFerencvaros 4-1 Malmo FFManchester United 3-2 Bodo/GlimtNice 1-4 RangersReal Sociedad 2-0 AjaxSlavia Prague 1-2 FenerbahceTottenham Hotspur 2-2 Roma Manchester United won a difficult game and Tottenham drew theirs by conceding a goal in time added on.

comments.author: CLS63
comments.body: Quote from: JollyGood on November 29, 2024, 10:55:09 AMSlavia Prague 1-2 FenerbahceIt was a happy day for me too as a Fenerbahçe fan.  Because we finally managed to get our 2nd win in the Europa League. However I didn't like our performance against Slavia Prague even a little. We were really bad at defending our opponent. I couldn't count how many critical chances they wasted. This match could have ended in a horrible way for us at the same time. This is what Mourinho needs to work on. We need to improve our defensive side.

comments.author: Patikno
comments.body: Besiktas & Nice made many devastating slips, not thinking that they could lose to a team that was not the favorite, even it was a defeat with a big score. Since the implementation of the new format, everything has become different, not only in the Europe League, strange things have also happened in the Champions League, seeing Real Madrid & Manchester City helpless in the standings.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Quote from: CLS63 on November 29, 2024, 07:25:35 PMIt was a happy day for me too as a Fenerbahçe fan.  Because we finally managed to get our 2nd win in the Europa League. However I didn't like our performance against Slavia Prague even a little. We were really bad at defending our opponent. I couldn't count how many critical chances they wasted. This match could have ended in a horrible way for us at the same time. This is what Mourinho needs to work on. We need to improve our defensive side.Congratulations to you and to all Fenerbahce fans. At this stage what matters more than the style of winning has to be the three points. I did not see any games involving Fenerbahce but will try to watch the highlights just to give feedback. The new style of European games (Europa League and Champions League) seems more exciting that the previous generation of qualification by group table. The knockout draw might have some big games.Quote from: Patikno on November 29, 2024, 08:46:39 PMBesiktas & Nice made many devastating slips, not thinking that they could lose to a team that was not the favorite, even it was a defeat with a big score. Since the implementation of the new format, everything has become different, not only in the Europe League, strange things have also happened in the Champions League, seeing Real Madrid & Manchester City helpless in the standings.Some of the bigger clubs were always going to find themselves in difficulty even if top eight would guarantee them an automatic place in the next round. Maybe Manchester City and Real Madrid can turn it around and climb up the table. As for the Europa League, there were some unexpected results including Tottenham vs Roma but that is to be expected.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Results of the games played this evening Thursday 23rd January:AZ Alkmaar 1-0 RomaBodo/Glimt 3-1 Maccabi Tel AvivFC Porto 0-1 Olympiakos FCFC Viktoria Plzen 2-0 AnderlechtFenerbahce 0-0 LyonMalmo FF 2-3 FC TwenteQarabag FK 2-3 FCSBTSG Hoffenheim 2-3 Tottenham HotspurEintracht Frankfurt 2-0 FerencvarosIF Elfsborg 1-0 NiceLazio 3-1 Real SociedadLudogorets 0-2 FC MidtjyllandManchester United 2-1 RangersPAOK Salonika 2-0 Slavia PragueRigas Futbola Skola 1-0 AjaxUnion Saint-Gilloise 2-1 BragaRangers scored a very late equaliser against Manchester United before Fernandes scored an even later winner. It was a frantic ending for Manchester United but they won and are sitting in 4th place.Tottenham are now sitting in 6th place in the Europa League table therefore both teams are currently occupying automatic qualification places.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are the games taking place this evening Thursday 30th January:Ajax vs GalatasarayAnderlecht vs TSG Hoffenheim Athletic Bilbao vs FC Viktoria Plzen Braga vs LazioDynamo Kiev vs Rigas Futbola SkolaFC Midtjylland vs FenerbahceFC Twente vs BesiktasFCSB vs Manchester UnitedFerencvaros vs AZ AlkmaarLyon vs LudogoretsMaccabi Tel Aviv vs FC PortoNice vs Bodo/GlimtOlympiakos FC vs Qarabag FKRangers vs Union Saint-GilloiseReal Sociedad vs PAOK SalonikaRoma vs Eintracht FrankfurtSlavia Prague vs Malmo FFTottenham Hotspur vs IF ElfsborgThese are the final league games of the tournament before the play-offs and knockout stages begin.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: These are the first leg games taking place on 6th March 2025:Bodo/Glimt vs OlympiacosFenerbahce vs RangersAjax vs Eintracht FrankfurtFCSB vs LyonAZ Alkmaar vs TottenhamReal Sociedad vs Man UtdViktoria Plzen vs LazioRoma vs Athletic BilbaoThese are the second leg games taking place on 6th March 2025:Olympiacos vs Bodo/GlimtRangers vs FenerbahceEintracht Frankfurt vs AjaxLyon vs FCSBTottenham Hotspur vs AZ AlkmaarManchester United vs Real SociedadLazio vs Viktoria PlzenAthletic Bilbao vs RomaHere are my choices for qualification to the quarter-finals: Olympiacos, Fenerbahce, Ajax, Lyon, Tottenham Hotspur, Manchester United, Lazio and Athletic Bilbao.
